title: Requires minors under 18 years to attend school on a full-time basis, unless in vocational program; must enroll in GED course until 19
summary: Requires minors under 18 years to attend school on a full-time basis, unless such minor is seventeen or older and enrolled in a vocational or occupational education program, with the consent of the school district and the person in parental relation with the minor; must enroll in GED course until age of 19 years, if the person leaves school.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to attendance of minors at full-time day instruction
